attributes.action: Send Remembrance Sunday Orders of Service to every UK household
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I watched the Remembrance Sunday service on TV and of course I observed the two minutes silence for those men and women who died for my freedom.

I would have liked to take a greater part in the commemoration, sing the hymn and have the opportunity to think about what these people did for me.

I believe that the Orders of Service for the Remembrance Sunday celebration should be sent to each and every household to give us all pause with regards to this most British of days.

Join me in asking the government to do this for our troops and those nations troops who have supported us during two world wars and numerous other conflicts that continue to this day.
